Name: Epic Dragon
About the game: Epic Dragon is an arcade-style game in which the player controls the Dragon Faby , which moves persistently to the right. The player is tasked with navigating Faby through pairs of pipes that have equally sized gaps placed at random heights. Epic Dragon was originally released in 2022 *EndLess Game *Funny Game *highest Score Challenge *Daily Updates
